恨不得.definition: wishing one could do sth; to hate to be unable; itching to do sth

恨之入骨.definition: to hate sb to the bone (idiom)

恨事.definition: a matter for regret or resentment

恨嫁.definition: (of a woman) to yearn to get married

恨海難填.definition: sea of hatred is hard to fill (idiom); irreconcilable division

恨鐵不成鋼.definition: lit. disappointed that iron does not turn into steel (idiom); fig. frustrated with sb who has failed to meet one's expectations
